This site allows you to withdraw consent: This site allows you to withdraw consent and object to targeted advertising based on EUID.
EUID transforms your email address into: EUID transforms your email address into an advertising identifier, which allows websites, apps, advertisers, and advertising companies to show you relevant advertising.
Your choice to withdraw consent and/or o: Your choice to withdraw consent and/or object to targeted advertising based on EUID will mean that sites or apps you interact with, and advertising companies working with them, will no longer process your EUID to serve targeted advertising. This is limited to sites which use EUID.
